name: Awesome Fun Game
tagline: Hours of fun with family and friends.
body:
### Welcome to AweSome Fun Game.
This is a simple game where you can win by getting 3 of your pieces in a straight line on 7 different locations on the board.   It is a variant of the traditional game [Nava Kankari ]( http://kreedaakaushalya.blogspot.com/2010/05/how-to-play-navakankari.html ). 
Purchase a set with a hand crafted wooden board and 32 printed game pieces and get started having Awesome Fun!.


### Themes and Templates
Weâ€™ve crafted some exciting themes like Pirates vs Ninjas to transport you to a different world while playing the game. Please purchase a few themes and try the same game with different themes. 

### Playing for free
Yes you read it right, we are releasing the complete board game and rule set for free too.  Although, we do request that you purchase one of the above options to support us.  

### Online and Apps
Are still in progress. 

### Support or Contact
Please write to info @ AwesomeFunGame dot com [ remove spaces and replace dot with . ] for more information.
